body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Rivera Motors. My name is Nathan Rivera. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Madison. Could you please provide me with your email address and phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my email address is m.howard@example.com and my phone number is five five five, two three four, one zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Madison. I have noted your information. Are you experiencing any issues with product quality at our dealership?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I recently purchased a car and it has been having some mechanical problems. I'm feeling quite sad about it.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I'm sorry to hear that, Madison. We will do our best to assist you with this issue. Please let us know more details about the problems you are facing.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: The car has been stalling unexpectedly, and there are strange noises coming from the engine.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Madison. We will arrange for a technician to inspect your car as soon as possible. We appreciate your patience.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out to us, Madison. Your concerns are important to us. We will be in touch shortly. Have a great day.
